name: RoArts
description: RoArts Token is a 100% Community-backed De-Fi token with scheduled burn operations, dynamic liquidity fee management, and rewards holders with roar tokens from every sale transaction. By creating NFT and Game, it is a crypto unit that provides different experiences to its investors in the Binance smart chain and earns while having fun. By implementing and simplifying the complex De-Fi process by auto roar reward mechanism that defined in the contract, RoArts will be focusing constantly on NFT Series creation process with a profitable business model.
